Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you. Considering its quality, features, and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
